name: Mailroom Mayhem
description:
Take revenge against the postal service in this dog themed bullet hell. Made in 48 hours for the IGDA SD 2021 Game Jam!- Tag us on TWITTER with your completion time and follow us for updates as we make this into a complete game! - CONTROLS: Movement: WASD Left Click: Throw Ball          Right Click: Recall Dog E: Pet Dog           F: Dog Dance

If you are having a slow framerate issue playing on Chrome browser, go into your Settings > System > Turn on "Use hardware acceleration when available"

Mailroom Mayhem By Mocha Moose Games - THEME: Companion ACCESSIBILITY: Keyboard, mouse - ART AND ANIMATION: Jessica Grudzien PROGRAMMING AND SOUND: Zane Rau Our second game jam!
